caption.title: FI ∞ as a function of SPV characteristics.
caption.p: The dependence of FI ∞ on several characteristics of the susceptibility profile vector of each ( E, V) pair involving an H1N1 strain isolated in 2009: (a) skewness of the SPV; (b) standard deviation of the SPV; (c) coefficient of variation of the SPV; (d) number of susceptibility sub-populations, m.
